text:
Hey, apologies if this is the wrong channel. I can post elsewhere if needed.

For the nodejs HubSpot sdk, there's a command for getting all products:
```HubSpotClient.crm.products.getAll()```
reference: <https://github.com/HubSpot/HubSpot-api-nodejs>

When I run this, is there a way to get additional properties back than what it provides by default? I need the SKU, but that's not included by default

It provides products back in this format
```{
    "id": "123",
    "properties": {
      "createdate": "2021-02-19T22:41:38.101Z",
      "description": "description text",
      "hs_lastmodifieddate": "2021-03-06T22:21:21.019Z",
      "hs_object_id": "123",
      "name": "Product Name",
      "price": "0"
    },
    "createdAt": "2021-02-19T22:41:38.101Z",
    "updatedAt": "2021-03-06T22:21:21.019Z",
    "archived": false
  }```
